description: Market beta estimated from 60-month regression of stock returns against market returns. CAPM predicts higher beta should yield higher returns, but empirical evidence shows a flat or even inverted relationship.
notes: Black, Jensen & Scholes (1972) 及 Fama & French (1992) 發現 beta 與報酬的關係遠比 CAPM 預測的平坦。Kenneth French Data Library 提供 60 個月 beta 排序的投資組合數據。
